attributes.action: More support in mainstream schools for children with SEN needs
attributes.additional_details: Mainstream schools need more support and more teachers with experience on how to deal with SEN and make children and families feel accpeted rather than giving up on the children.
attributes.background: My son started reception this year in September 2021 and after 2 days the headteacher said this school is not suited for him. After accepting him with his EHCP and receiving the highest funding ASC1.

rejection.details:
We understand you want schools to receive more 'support' to help them support children with SEN, however it's not clear whether you want them to receive financial support, training, or something else. 

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587365
